website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are making mac and cheese or another recipe that requires short pasta that holds sauce well, this is a classic choice.
pros: Crafted in Italy with grain technique that creates pasta that cooks to perfection with excellent texture
Elbow style – one of the most versatile and favored short pastas for a variety of dishes
cons: Some consumers wish the elbows were slightly larger
A few reports of boxes with crusted pasta upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Really good pasta
customer_reviews.text: This is very good pasta. I use Amazon's subscribe and save a lot due to not having a car, too hard to haul stuff home via the bus, so, it works out excellent for me. Usually I use Barilla pasta, but can't find the small shells anywhere anymore. Saw these here and ordered, taste great, seem to have a nice full texture to them. I make my macaroni salad with small shells, not medium shells! These are perfect! Thank you! I can imagine they would work well in some soups too. Will continue to order them on subscribe and save as long as they are offered!
customer_reviews.author: VeeBee

customer_reviews.title: So yummy - worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I never knew boxed pasta could be ssoooooooooo goooooooooooood! Perfect "tooth" to the elbows - makes excellent mac and cheese. Highly recommend - I know it is a bit pricey but so much better than the less expensive boxes at the grocery stores (no matter what they say). Treat yourself - you may never eat another brand of pasta again. Can't wait to try the other varieties.
customer_reviews.author: PamInSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Timely Received
customer_reviews.text: During the time of pandemic when I can't find any type of pasta, this was great to receive in such a timely manner. The expiration date is a long way out and I can't wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Ser

customer_reviews.title: Best pasta on the planet
customer_reviews.text: No other pasta has the same bite. It’s perfection. I can’t eat anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great pasta
customer_reviews.text: Having lived in Italy, I can attest that this is some of the best pasta made today. Buying in bulk makes it even better. Makes perfect macaroni/cheese. Just boil until almost done. Then put in pot with velveeta, parmesan, ham, milk and butter heated almost to boiling. Bake on 350 for 15-20 min, with breadcrumbs on top. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Paton

customer_reviews.title: Best pasta brand there is!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pasta you can eat. It holds it shape, not gummy. I have been using De Cecco pasta for over 30 years. In NYC I could get all the time, but after moving to Mn I had a hard time finding it, so I just order it online.
customer_reviews.author: K. benford

customer_reviews.title: Love my seashells
customer_reviews.text: Love my seashells! It's so difficult to find them in stores nowadays, but these were a staple at my Italian grandmother's house. My family *NEEDS* seashells when they're sick, and now I have a good supply so there shouldn't be any more pasta-induced meltdowns!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian M

customer_reviews.title: Egg Free
customer_reviews.text: It's egg free which is a plus for someone like me who is now allergic to eggs. All the other major brands either have egg in their noodles, or are processed in facilities that also process egg products. I've never had a reaction to this brand and I'm sensitive to even the slightest cross contamination.
customer_reviews.author: bk*nay

customer_reviews.title: Never go wrong with DeCecco
customer_reviews.text: DeCecco makes the best pasta. It's so much better than Barilla. Unfortunately unable to find the small shells locally anymore.
customer_reviews.author: The BaldMan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pasta, AND it's very difficult to find "small" shells anywhere anymore. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lael W.

customer_reviews.title: The best fresh tasting elbows I ever ate
customer_reviews.text: The best fresh tasting elbows I ever ate! Easy to cook and can be used in so many varieties of recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Best Pasta on the market
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason why Carmella on the Sopranos had a cabinet full of DeCecco pasta in her pantry ~ it's the best on the market. Moving to another state made this very had to get, especially the capilini so I ordered the five box package and plan never to run out again.
customer_reviews.author: D. BrownTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: De Cecco is the ONLY pasta I'll buy!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot find these little shells anywhere but Amazon. The De Cecco brand is the only pasta I will buy because it is consistently delicious pasta, unlike any other brand of dried pasta out there.
customer_reviews.author: muggets

customer_reviews.title: small shell pasta
customer_reviews.text: The pasta came in small boxes which is easier for me to handle and store. It is easy to prepare following the directions. The pasta has a good taste and is excellent in a variety of recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cheney

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: When I cook, I use these noodles in different ways for which my kids really like. I use tomato sauce and seasonings with a little bit of meat and the gobble it up.
customer_reviews.author: Lh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soup
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for soup. Very small shells that cook well in all kinds of soup. Also good for mac and cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Christina & Eric

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best dry pasta you can buy. Fair price and love the convenience of purchasing through Amazon. You won't be sorry with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tctne

customer_reviews.title: Curly pasta.
customer_reviews.text: Makes great spaghetti or mac and cheese. Buying them in bulk helps cut down on price per unit. Anywhere I can to save $$$ is great.
customer_reviews.author: gk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using DeCecco for over 30 years, it's the Best
customer_reviews.author: mrbruno

customer_reviews.title: La migliora pasta!
customer_reviews.text: That is the best pasta for a great price!! I cannot find that price in grocery store. Veramente una buona pasta!
customer_reviews.author: B Mel

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I have been having trouble finding the very small seas shells that I have always used in pasta salad. I was pleasantly surprised to find these at Amazon. These are the perfect size pasta for making a pasta salad or adding to soup. They arrived quickly, and I now have an ample supply. Thanks Amazon for carry so many products.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl H

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PASTA EVER WOULD NOT BUY ANY OTHER
customer_reviews.text: DE CECCO IS THE BEST PASTA MADE I HAVE USED IT FOR MORE THAN 25YEARS I WOULD DRIVE IN NYC TO THE LITTLE ITALY DISTRIBUTOR TO BUY IT. MY DAUGHTER BUYS IT BUY THE CASE , ONCE YOU TRY IT YOU ARE HOOKED. AMAZON HAS THE BEST DEALS AND IT IS DELIVERED TO ME I JUST LOVE IT. JUST REMEMBER NOT TO OVERCOOK IT . PASTA SHOULD BE ALDENTE . I USE THIS ELBOW ONE FOR MY SON FOR MACARONI SALAD AND OF COURSE FOR MANY OTHER RECIPES. BE SURE TO TRY IT. ALL DE CECCO IS GREAT SERIOULSLY MORE THAN 25YEARS LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: Very good pasta
customer_reviews.text: DeCecco is one of my two favorite pastas. It cooks up nicely without getting gummy and is far better than most pasta when used for left-overs because it doesn't become mush.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: De Cecco Pasta
customer_reviews.text: Good pasta for a good price and convenient with the Subscribe and Save option! I made macaroni and cheese with it and the dish was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Shrout

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I purchased this.. It did not cook up like what I was used to and did not have the flavor I was used to. So I will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancie Sayre

customer_reviews.title: FOUND IT AT LAST
customer_reviews.text: I've been in a panic as the store that carried my DeCecco elbows has discontinued the brand. I have called every store I could think of. Some did carry the brand, but none had the elbows I just have to have. It is by far the best I have ever had. My neighbor laughs at me and says she never heard of anyone having a favorite brand macaroni. I told her to try it and she may just change her tune. So happy I know I can get it from Amazon. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: DeCecco's the Best

customer_reviews.title: Listed as Flavor:Orzo  |  Size:16 Ounce (Pack of 10) only received one box
customer_reviews.text: Wasted my time ordering this pack of 10 only to receive 1 box. Was not able to get a refund for missing boxes.
customer_reviews.author: K & M

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: It was a fast shipment and the product was in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: SCAM
customer_reviews.text: Should be half this price. Gouging during a health crisis should be grounds for jail time.
customer_reviews.author: Lt. Vinyard

customer_reviews.title: The best elbows!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to see these on Amazon and at a good price -- the elbows, in particular, are really hard to find in my area. The pasta is high quality, they cook quickly, and they're really tasty. I just ordered some and can't wait for them to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: davisite

customer_reviews.title: It's De Cecco or it ain't pasta.
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. Nice texture that keeps its bite will still tender.
customer_reviews.author: themenz

customer_reviews.title: Grrrr-ate
customer_reviews.text: We want you to know that we are very pleased with the quality of service your company provides. We sincerely appreciate your responsiveness and the way you conduct business. We have recommended your company to others because of our satisfaction with your service & product. We look forward to doing business with you for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Pranzitelli

product_meta.title: De Cecco Pasta, Elbows, 16 Ounce (Pack of 5)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Elbows| Size:16 Ounce (Pack of 5)De Cecco gently grinds the heart of each grain, mixes it with cold spring water, then kneads the dough slowly. This results in pasta with the exceptional de Cecco aroma, flavor, and consistency. Pasta easily cooks to perfection, has a great firm texture, and a delicious “fresh” pasta taste. It has a rougher surface, which helps the sauce stick to it. Since 1886 we have liked our pasta to be bronze drawn and slowly dried because we like it to fall into the plate full of taste, rough and always "al dente". Even though our taste has not changed, as we feel the same love for tradition, we have continued to improve our production technologies. Make de Cecco pasta the secret ingredient for your most amazing dishes.Buon Appetito!
feature_bullets: Shaped through Bronze Dies to create a rough surface to better retain sauce
Slowly Dried at low Temperature to Preserve Nutritional Properties. GMO Free. Kosher.
